title: Trump hosts exclusive dinner for top 220 $TRUMP coin holders at golf club
summary: President Trump hosted an exclusive private dinner at Trump National Golf Club for the 220 largest holders of his $TRUMP memecoin cryptocurrency. The event was part of his $500,000 access club arrangement, creating an unprecedented pay-for-access scheme where cryptocurrency investments directly translated to presidential access. The dinner demonstrated how Trump monetized the presidency through digital assets, offering exclusive government access to those who invested most heavily in his personal crypto ventures.

sources.title: Warren Documents Trump's Crypto Pay-for-Access Scheme
Trump Hosts Private Dinner for Top Cryptocurrency Investors
